content: **finished measurements** height 7 circumference 52 **materials** universal yarn bamboo bloom handpaints 8% acrylic 44% wool 48% rayon from bamboo 100g/154 yds 335 hana 1 hank needles us size 10 6 mm circular or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle **gauge** 12 sts x 20 row = 4 in stockinette over thin portions unblocked **note ** some have reported that casting on up to 150 stitches instead of the called-for 110 gives them a more pleasing length
